argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idresperm.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) |
| 2 |  | idrespermg.e | |- E = ( G |`s { ( _I |` A ) } ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_idressubgsymg | |- ( A e. V -> { ( _I |` A ) } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_pgrpsubgsymgbi | |- ( A e. V -> ( { ( _I |` A ) } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( { ( _I |` A ) } C_ ( Base ` G ) /\ ( G |`s { ( _I |` A ) } ) e. Grp ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_snex | |- { ( _I |` A ) } e. _V |
| 7 | 2, 4 | #P_ressbas | |- ( { ( _I |` A ) } e. _V -> ( { ( _I |` A ) } i^i ( Base ` G ) ) = ( Base ` E ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mp1i | |- ( A e. V -> ( { ( _I |` A ) } i^i ( Base ` G ) ) = ( Base ` E ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_inss2 | |- ( { ( _I |` A ) } i^i ( Base ` G ) ) C_ ( Base ` G ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl6eqssr | |- ( A e. V -> ( Base ` E ) C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 11 | 2 | #P_eqcomi | |- ( G |`s { ( _I |` A ) } ) = E |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eleq1i | |- ( ( G |`s { ( _I |` A ) } ) e. Grp <-> E e. Grp ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_biimpi | |- ( ( G |`s { ( _I |` A ) } ) e. Grp -> E e. Grp ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( { ( _I |` A ) } C_ ( Base ` G ) /\ ( G |`s { ( _I |` A ) } ) e. Grp ) -> E e. Grp ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_anim12ci | |- ( ( A e. V /\ ( { ( _I |` A ) } C_ ( Base ` G ) /\ ( G |`s { ( _I |` A ) } ) e. Grp ) ) -> ( E e. Grp /\ ( Base ` E ) C_ ( Base ` G ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_ex | |- ( A e. V -> ( ( { ( _I |` A ) } C_ ( Base ` G ) /\ ( G |`s { ( _I |` A ) } ) e. Grp ) -> ( E e. Grp /\ ( Base ` E ) C_ ( Base ` G ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 5, 16 | #P_sylbid | |- ( A e. V -> ( { ( _I |` A ) } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( E e. Grp /\ ( Base ` E ) C_ ( Base ` G ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 3, 17 | #P_mpd | |- ( A e. V -> ( E e. Grp /\ ( Base ` E ) C_ ( Base ` G ) ) ) |
